stage1_tasks.title: Basic Functionality
stage1_tasks.description: Build a PDF Merger Web Application. Some test files are provided in your workspace.
details: Let users upload multiple PDF files (3+)
Display names and page count of uploaded files
Merge the PDFs and let the user download the new document

stage1_tasks.title: Error Handling
stage1_tasks.description: Ensure basic error handling (e.g. invalid file formats, corrupted files).

stage1_tasks.title: Remove PDFs
stage1_tasks.description: Enable removing individual PDFs from the file list.

stage1_tasks.title: File Names
stage1_tasks.description: Support renaming of the output file before downloading.

stage1_tasks.title: File Preview
stage1_tasks.description: Show the first page of each file as preview.

stage1_tasks.title: Drag and Drop
stage1_tasks.description: Use drag and drop for upload and reordering.

stage2_tasks.title: Additional Functionality
stage2_tasks.description: Add features to your existing PDF Merger.
details: Support selecting specific page ranges of uploaded files
Display preview of selected pages before downloading

stage2_tasks.title: Reordering Pages
stage2_tasks.description: Enable reordering of selected pages before merging.

stage2_tasks.title: Split Mode
stage2_tasks.description: Allow users to split PDFs into smaller files.

stage2_tasks.title: File Compression
stage2_tasks.description: Compress the resulting file to reduce its size and show compression savings.
